page.title: 07Employment
page.content: There is quite a number of farms in our block, but few farmers employ local inhabitants, although in summer they use extra workers for silaging and harvesting. There are no industries so you have to find a job in a larger settlement or set up your own business, which some people have since their former employers cannot find enough money to pay them. There is a car body shop, a petrol station and a haulage contractor. There is a pub and two shops in Crossmichael. One of them does Bed & Breakfast. Some people work for the Forestry Commission.
